div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 230px; margin-left: 1px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Manages the applications that expose services

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 662px; height: 1px; padding-top: 429px; margin-left: 330px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 230px; margin-left: 1131px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Services are stored here so they can be located by other applications

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 230px; margin-left: 361px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.font: Connect with Service Platform, to fetch active services

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 230px; margin-left: 741px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.font: Connect with Service Registry, to register new services and query existing ones
